pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, January 16, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, January 16, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement during a live discussion on the Leaders Today Instagram page.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will announce the flag bearers who will represent Canada during the opening ceremonies of the PyeongChang Olympic Games.

Foyer
House of Commons

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

Toronto, Ontario

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Thai Pongal and Tamil Heritage Month Celebration.

Scarborough Convention Centre
20 Torham Place

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.
